titleStmt.title: William Glass et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2922

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1859-1862

body.p: The undersigned citizens and voters of Kentucky respectfully request the Governor of Kentucky to call a convention of delegates to be elected by the people to take into consideration the questions arising out of the present extraordinary state of public affairs.

William Glass 1
George McDonald 2
V. C. Bradley 3
William Hockensmith 4
John Wayt 5
H. W. Ford. 6
W, D Poindexter 7
L. S. Sebree 8
Wm P. Duvall 9
D H Gatewood 10
J F Sinclair 11
David Poindexter 12
J. M. Burnett. 13
Wm. Butler 14
Jno. W. Holloway for the Union 15
A Calvert 16
Wallis Johnson 17
Wm P. Calvert 17
Presten Calvert 18
F, D Johnson 19
Robert. Johnson 20
E R Wright 21
Wm McMillin 22
Wm Orr 23
S. S. Thomason 24
B. N Bradford 25
A W Massie 26
Jonas Bramblet 27
D Susley 28
Geo. W. Holloway 29
Charles Murphy 30
Stafford Jones 31
William T. Pitts 32
Wm McCarthy 33
John. N. Grivens 34
James Elliott, Alsop 35
L, D, Holloway 36
A. J. Addison 37
Thos. Wash ,38
